definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

sentences.english: The 34 democratically elected leaders in the Western Hemisphere will attend the three-day summit.
sentences.chinese: 西半球34位民選領導人將出席這次爲期三天的會議。

sentences.english: And let every other power know that this hemisphere intends to remain the master of its own house.
sentences.chinese: 讓其它國家都知道，西半球的事西半球自己會管。

sentences.english: And let every other power know that this hemisphere intends to remain the master of its own house.
sentences.chinese: 讓其它國家都知道，西半球的事西半球自己會管。

sentences.english: Molycorp is the western hemisphere's only producer of rare earth products.
sentences.chinese: 鉬業公司是西半球唯一的稀土生產商。

sentences.english: Protti manages the six student leader institutes for the Western Hemisphere.
sentences.chinese: 普羅蒂負責管理西半球的六個學生領袖研究班。

sentences.english: "This is really the cradle of sea turtle reproduction for the western hemisphere."The
sentences.chinese: 在西半球，這裏確實是海龜的發源地。

sentences.english: A victory for Allende would imperil our interests in the Western Hemisphere.
sentences.chinese: 阿連德一旦獲勝，就將危及我們在西半球的利益。

sentences.english: The Gateway Arch is the tallest man-made monument in the Western Hemisphere.
sentences.chinese: 大拱門是西半球最高的人工紀念碑。

sentences.english: Ancient cartographers did not know of the existence of the Western Hemisphere.
sentences.chinese: 古代的製圖者不知道西半球的存在。

sentences.english: In the Western Hemisphere, only the US and Cuba have not joined the treaty.
sentences.chinese: 西半球裏只有美國和古巴兩個國家尚未加入該項條約。

sentences.english: It was the first time the virus had been identified in the Western Hemisphere.
sentences.chinese: 這是西半球第一次發現該種病毒。

sentences.english: Caffeine is the most widely consumed behaviourally active substance in the western world.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡是西半球飲用最多的影響人體行爲的飲料。

definition: America (including North, Central and South America)/the Americas/abbr. for 亞美利加洲|亚美利加洲[Ya4 mei3 li4 jia1 Zhou1]

pinyin: guo2 ji4 ri4 qi1 bian4 geng1 xian4
